statistic.name: Scatter Plot
statistic.description: This program creates a simple scatter plot
statistic.rcode: # Where am I? getwd() # List files in the 'Programs' folder #list.files("Programs") # Bring in data #dataset = read.csv("data-marketing-budget-12mo.csv", header=T, # Scatter plot of Independents vs Dependent library(ggplot2) ggplot(data = df, aes(x = Xvar, y = Yvar)) + geom_point()
